languages.text: "Нужно. И я клянусь биться ради этого и не терять надежды даже... даже когда ложь, скверна и предательство окружают со всех сторон!"

traits.locale_text: "Нужно. И я клянусь биться ради этого и не терять надежды даже... даже когда ложь, скверна и предательство окружают со всех сторон!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"
languages.original_text: "Нужно. И я клянусь биться ради этого и не терять надежды даже... даже когда ложь, скверна и предательство окружают со всех сторон!"

traits.locale_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我们会的。我发誓要为了这个目标而战，绝不会失去希望，即使……即使我们已经被欺骗、腐化与背叛团团包围！”
languages.original_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"

traits.locale_text: “我们会的。我发誓要为了这个目标而战，绝不会失去希望，即使……即使我们已经被欺骗、腐化与背叛团团包围！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Así es. Y juro que lucharé para alcanzar esa meta y que no perderé la esperanza aunque... aunque el engaño, la corrupción y la traición nos rodeen por todos lados!».
languages.original_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Y juro que lucharé para alcanzar esa meta y que no perderé la esperanza aunque... aunque el engaño, la corrupción y la traición nos rodeen por todos lados!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「そうしよう。そしてその目的のために戦い、希望を失わぬことを誓う。たとえ、欺瞞や腐敗、そして裏切りに四方を囲まれていようとも！」
languages.original_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうしよう。そしてその目的のために戦い、希望を失わぬことを誓う。たとえ、欺瞞や腐敗、そして裏切りに四方を囲まれていようとも！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja. Und ich schwöre, für dieses Ziel zu kämpfen und nicht die Hoffnung zu verlieren, selbst ... selbst wenn Täuschung, Korruption und Verrat uns von allen Seiten umgeben!"
languages.original_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Und ich schwöre, für dieses Ziel zu kämpfen und nicht die Hoffnung zu verlieren, selbst ... selbst wenn Täuschung, Korruption und Verrat uns von allen Seiten umgeben!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « En effet. Et je jure de me battre pour cela sans jamais perdre espoir, même si... même si la fourberie, la corruption et la traîtrise semblent venir de toute part ! »
languages.original_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Et je jure de me battre pour cela sans jamais perdre espoir, même si... même si la fourberie, la corruption et la traîtrise semblent venir de toute part ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"

languages.text: "Evet. Bu uğurda ümidimi kaybetmeden savaşacağıma; hile, yozluk ve ihanet dört bir yanımızı sarsa dahi mücadeleyi sürdüreceğime ant içerim!"
languages.original_text: "We do. And I swear to fight for that end and not to lose hope, even... even when deceit, corruption, and treachery surround us on all sides!"

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Bu uğurda ümidimi kaybetmeden savaşacağıma; hile, yozluk ve ihanet dört bir yanımızı sarsa dahi mücadeleyi sürdüreceğime ant içerim!"
